title: 4/27/24: SF’s Free “Senior Smiles” Dental & Wellness Health Fair (Spring 2024) - FREE
text:
Home» *Top Pick*, Fairs & Festivals, In Person, Other, Sports & Wellness
SF’s Free “Senior Smiles” Dental & Wellness Health Fair (Spring 2024)
[Saturday, April 27, 2024](/2024/04/27/)- 10:00 am to 1:00 pm | Cost: [FREE*
*Valid for seniors age 55+
](#) University of the Pacific School of Dentistry| 155 5th St, San Francisco, CA
Free / Learn More
Are you a Bay Area senior age 55+ looking to improve your health and wellness? Join us for a free community health event!
Services will be provided by students and faculty volunteers from University of the Pacific’s dentistry, audiology, physical therapy and social work programs, and other partners.
FREE HEALTH AND WELLNESS SERVICES
• Dental health screenings
• Hearing exams
• Vision screenings
• Diabetes screenings
• Blood pressure testing
• Balance, flexibility and core strength evaluations
• Oral cancer and denture screenings
• Medical and dental care community resources
• Free oral health prevention bags
LOCATION:
University of the Pacific, Arthur A. Dugoni School of Dentistry
155 Fifth Street (enter on corner of 5th and Minna Streets)
San Francisco, CA 94103
Located 1.5 blocks from Powell St BART/Muni station. Nearest parking is at Fifth and Mission/Yerba Buena Garage. The clinic is wheelchair accessible.
The event is first come, first served. If questions, please email .
Disclaimer: Please double check event information with the event organizer as events can be canceled, details can change after they are added to our calendar, and errors do occur.
